original_title: “Ramiya” Crowned Champion at The Voice Sri Lanka 2023 Grand Finale
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Sirasa TV, the pioneering channel in introducing reality television to Sri Lankan households, once again showcases its prominence. The highly anticipated finale of "The Voice Sri Lanka 2023" unfolded last night at Stein Studios Ratmalana.

In an exhilarating showdown, Rameesh Sashinka, popularly known as Ramiya, emerged as the victorious champion of The Voice Sri Lanka. The grand event witnessed the top five contestants from each of the five teams battling it out for the coveted title.

Shehan Rangana, representing Coach Umaria, exhibited remarkable talent throughout the competition. Chanupa Deshtha, under the guidance of Coach Kasun, displayed exceptional prowess as well. Chinthaka Roshan, mentored by Coach B&S, showcased his outstanding abilities. Lastly, Sheron Silva, representing Coach Shashika, delivered a remarkable performance.

Notably, this season of The Voice Sri Lanka made history by introducing a fifth coach, a first in Asia. This innovation added a new dimension to the show and further heightened the excitement among the audience.

The Voice franchise, spanning across 180 countries globally, has provided a platform for Sri Lankan talent to shine on the international stage. It continues to captivate audiences around the world with its exceptional blend of music and talent.
